metadata.title: USN-6086-1 -- minimatch vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that minimatch incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6086-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-minimatch - 3.0.4-3+deb10u1build0.18.04.1 No subscription required
